Generic function for calculating thermo- and kinematic indices derived from atmospheric profiling. Further details given in the sounding_compute() function

Source: R/RcppExports.R
sounding_default.Rd

Generic function for calculating thermo- and kinematic indices derived from atmospheric profiling. Further details given in the sounding_compute() function

sounding_default(
  pressure,
  altitude,
  temp,
  dpt,
  wd,
  ws,
  export_profile,
  accuracy
)

Arguments

pressure

pressure [hPa]
altitude

altitude [meters]
temp

temperature [degree Celsius]
dpt

dew point temperature [degree Celsius]
wd

wind direction [azimuth in degrees]
ws

wind speed [knots]
export_profile

possibility to export interpolated profile on the levels defined in accuracy configuration
accuracy

accuracy of computations where 3 = high (slow), 2 = medium (recommended), 1 = low (fast)

Value

  1. MU_CAPE

  2. MU_03km_CAPE

  3. MU_HGL_CAPE

  4. MU_CIN

  5. MU_LCL_HGT

  6. MU_LFC_HGT

  7. MU_EL_HGT

  8. MU_LI

  9. MU_WMAX

  10. MU_EL_TEMP

  11. MU_LCL_TEMP

  12. MU_LFC_TEMP

  13. MU_MIXR

  14. SB_CAPE

  15. SB_03km_CAPE

  16. SB_HGL_CAPE

  17. SB_CIN

  18. SB_LCL_HGT

  19. SB_LFC_HGT

  20. SB_EL_HGT

  21. SB_LI

  22. SB_WMAX

  23. SB_EL_TEMP

  24. SB_LCL_TEMP

  25. SB_LFC_TEMP

  26. SB_MIXR

  27. ML_CAPE

  28. ML_03km_CAPE

  29. ML_HGL_CAPE

  30. ML_CIN

  31. ML_LCL_HGT

  32. ML_LFC_HGT

  33. ML_EL_HGT

  34. ML_LI

  38. ML_LFC_TEMP

  49. HGT_min_thetae_04km

  60. BS_01km

  91. Bunkers_MW_M

  93. Showalter_Index

  95. SWEAT_Index

  96. STP

  104. ML_WMAXSHEAR

  105. MU_EFF_WMAXSHEAR

  106. SB_EFF_WMAXSHEAR

  107. ML_EFF_WMAXSHEAR

Examples

pressure = c(1000, 855, 700, 500, 300, 100, 10) 
altitude = c(0, 1500, 2500, 6000, 8500, 12000, 25000)
temp = c(25, 10, 0, -15, -30, -50, -92)
dpt = c(20, 5, -5, -30, -55, -80, -99)
wd = c(0, 90, 135, 180, 270, 350, 0)
ws = c(5, 10, 20, 30, 40, 5, 0)
sounding_default(pressure, altitude, temp, dpt, wd, ws, accuracy = 1, export_profile = 0)
